title: Coming of Age (2013)
overview: In February 2012, the death of Feng Fei Fei, the Taiwanese singing stardom in the 60s, shocked the whole island. People were occupied in a haze of mourning. At the same time, a single mother and her daughter got news from their husband and father, who had cut contact with them for 18 years and now wanted to meet them.
storyline: In February 2012, the death of Feng Fei Fei, the Taiwanese singing stardom in the 60s, shocked the whole island. People were occupied in a haze of mourning. At the same time, a single mother and her daughter got news from their husband and father, who had cut contact with them for 18 years and now wanted to meet them. Not knowing what he was really after, they had planned to stick to their present life no matter what happened when they saw him. However, changes had already taken place in their minds, both unconscious and unspoken. In an old restaurant filled with their memories in the 60s, the three of them confronted each other in a lunch meeting, as a family but like strangers.
